summary: BlockFi raised $350 million at a larger valuation of $3 billion in March last year.
title: BlockFi Valuation Sinks to $1B in Latest Funding Round: Report
content: Crypto lender BlockFi is set to close a funding round at a lower valuation than its previous raises, according to a report by The Block.
Read more: Goldman Sachs Makes Its First Bitcoin-Backed Loan
UPDATE (13:35 UTC June 7): Adds comment from BlockFi

entity.type: Goldman Sachs Makes Its First Bitcoin
